Dream Final Product

A comfortable, durable shoe that replaces Google maps, your headphones and your fitbit all in one.

PCB Mechanical Design

SolidWorks

SolidWorks is a solid modeling computer-aided design and computer-aided engineering computer program that runs primarily on Microsoft Windows.

PCB Electrical Design

KiCAD

KiCad is a free software suite for electronic design automation. It facilitates the design of schematics for electronic circuits and their conversion to PCB designs.

PCB Software Design

Arduino IDE

Arduino is an open-source hardware and software company, project and user community that designs and manufactures single-board microcontrollers and microcontroller kits for building digital devices.
